content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Emilia Müller.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Yes,] We agreed on a rental price of 475 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed-upon rental price was 475 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Emilia Müller, at 8. She was respectful, reasonable, and straightforward in her negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [No,] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point in the negotiation. Emilia Müller conducted herself with professionalism and respectfulness.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [However, I did not feel discriminated or offended. I appreciate your consideration, but there was no such instance in the negotiation.]
name: Peter Schmidt
